title: Katie Price picture sneaking out of ex Kris Boyson’s house
text:
Katie is in hot water

Katie Price knows she’s ‘got some explaining to do’ after she was pictured sneaking out of her ex-boyfriend Kris Boyson’s house after spending the night.

Yes, the saga of Pricey and Boyson continues with these new pictures which show Katie, with bedraggled hair and a comfy hoodie and baseball cap, strapping her two youngest children into her car and Kris, ever the gentleman, closing the door for her.

‘Katie was totally caught out’ with these pictures, sources told Metro.co.uk, alleging that ‘they’ve been in contact longer than they’ve let on and maybe bumping into each other at Thrope Park was more a stunt than a coincidence’.

The pictures come amid reports that Katie’s boyfriend Charles Drury dumped her for sneaking around on him with Kris.

‘She lied to Charles,’ said the insider, ‘Katie was totally caught out.’

‘She’s in hot water, they’ve been sneaking behind people’s back and it’s not cool.’

Katie Price knows she’s ‘got some explaining to do’

It’s been a tangled web Katie has been weaving but it all began in August when she allegedly dumped Kris, 30, via text which left the fitness instructor heartbroken.

It was said that Kris discovered she had been cheating on him with builder Charles, whom she has now allegedly cheated on with Kris.

It’s been a tangled web Katie has been weaving

‘They’ve been sneaking behind people’s back and it’s not cool.’

‘She lied to Charles,’ said the insider

Kris had seen Katie through several surgeries, and was close to all of her children.

The personal trainer was regularly on her reality show My Crazy Life and was seen cuddling the youngest children Jett and Bunny, and helping Harvey to get healthy.

He was left shocked earlier in the year when she returned from Turkey looking like ‘a bloated alien’.

He told her that she didn’t need the surgeries in his eyes, before asking: ‘You won’t even know what you look like, will you?’

But in August it was claimed she had cheated on Kris with Charles Drury, and pictures emerged of her on holiday with her family and new beau, while Kris moved her stuff out of his house.

However, it seems Katie and Kris have stayed in touch and have now become closer than ever.

‘She was trying to convince him that she was only picking something up from Kris

It was then claimed that ‘Katie was straight on the phone when she realised she’d been caught coming out of Kris’s house’.

‘She was trying to convince him that she was only picking something up from Kris, but Charles has suspected for a while that she’d been seeing Kris behind his back so he didn’t believe her,’ according to The Sun.
